import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Card, Col, Image, ListGroup, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; function ProductScreen({ match }) { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct() { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setProducts(data) } fetchProduct() }, []) return (
Voltar

 Price: U$ {product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: U$ {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock ' : 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
